description:
Crabs seek revenge upon a monkey for wounding their mother, and are aided by a mortar and cow poop.  A divine oracle leads a man to riches.  A man`s head becomes the scene of strange happenings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Monkey Crab / The Straw Headman / Head Lake
Saru Kani / Warashibe Chouja / Atama ga Ike
さるかに / わらしべ長者 / 頭が池
